item.title: Edit 4k Video of Convention Panel in DaVinci - Upwork
item.description:
We have 4k raw footage from a convention. This project is to edit and grade the footage from a panel discussion of approximately 45 minutes. We have one long steady shot, plus a second camera generally focusing on whoever is speaking, plus occasional wandering b-roll, and high quality audio is separately recorded. Basically, all this needs to be synced up and we would like it to look more interesting, kinetic, and engaging than just the steady shot. Because it is a lot of footage, we will be looking to use the proxies system in DaVinci.

Requirements
* Editing experience
* Experience syncing separately recorded sound to video
* Use DaVinci for editing
* Experience sharing projects in Google Drive or DropBox or Blackmagic Cloud or otherwise editing with DaVinci proxies footage. (Open to recommendations of your preferred ways to work remotely with large amounts of footage.)
* Comfortable with discussions of grown up subject matter

Plusses
* Color grading experience (helpful for this edit, but open to hiring color grading and editing separately)
* It is a plus if you have experience with video retouching to remove skin blemishes and similar (probably not needed for this specific edit, but helpful for ongoing work.)
* Comfortable editing footage of people in bikinis (not needed for this specific edit, but helpful for ongoing work.)
* It is a plus if you have ever made a sizzle reel to show a minute or two of highlights with quick cuts to showcase most exciting footage from a project.

Please estimate how many hours you expect this particular project to take for editing one panel discussion. We are, however, seeking two video editors for ongoing work. Ongoing work would include red carpet interviews, photoshoot BTS, remote podcasts, and other event footage.



Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 03:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 2D reel creator - Upwork
item.description:
Hello


We need some high skilled 2d animators to create some reels.

Our characters are in moho file: https://we.tl/t-LVScdCwxdg

In this wetransfer link you can see some reels we already made: https://wetransfer.com/downloads/bfb95475205273fa2809b2b2e1bb885720240629041219/88c48e

These are the backgrounds that the aimator used for the reels: https://we.tl/t-BYl4yqnyFN

Just send me if you create quality reels that have potential to go viral.


Regards

item.title: Creation of Welcome Video for an Orthopaedic Surgeon's Website - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create a short welcome and introduction video for an orthopaedic surgeon's website. The footage has already been shot, but we need a professional to enhance and compile it into a polished final product.

Key Responsibilities:
Edit and compile provided video footage into a cohesive and engaging welcome video (sent through drop box)
Enhance and improve the sound quality of the surgeon's speech, addressing issues with the original audio.
Add appropriate background music, transitions, and other effects to elevate the overall quality and professionalism of the video.
Ensure the final video aligns with the professional tone and style expected for a medical website.

Video Length: Approximately 2-3 minutes.

Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 03:02 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:M4V, MPG, Video Intro & Outro, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Editing
Skills: M4V, MPG, Video Intro & Outro, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply
